about.title: About Thuy Loi University
about.description: Thuy Loi University is a key national public university in Vietnam, established in 1959. The university specializes in water resources, hydraulic engineering, infrastructure technology, environment, and many other technical sciences.

contact.title: Support Contact
contact.description: If you need assistance with the system, please contact us through the following channels

history.pageDescription: The development journey of Thuy Loi University from 1959 to present

1959.content: Establishment of the Institute of Hydraulic Engineering and Electricity, laying the foundation for hydraulic engineering and hydropower engineer training in Vietnam.
1959.imgCaption: The Institute of Hydraulic Engineering and Electricity in 1959

1964.content: Renamed to Thuy Loi University, officially expanding training and research in the field of water resources.
1964.imgCaption: Thuy Loi University inauguration ceremony in 1964

1997.content: The university expanded its training facilities in Ho Chi Minh City, marking an important development for water resources education in the South.
1997.imgCaption: Second campus in Ho Chi Minh City, expanded in 1997

2001.content: The university opened Information Technology programs and established the Faculty of Information Technology, marking the expansion into new technology fields.

2006.content: The university began implementing its 2006-2020 development strategy, focusing on multi-disciplinary training, including Information Technology.

2012.content: Establishment of the International Training Center, expanding international cooperation and providing internationally standardized training programs.

2015.content: Cooperation with Samsung Electronics to develop IT labs and recruit IT graduates from the university.

2019.content: 60th anniversary of the university's establishment, marking the development journey and contributions to Vietnam's water resources sector.

2024.content: 65th anniversary of Thuy Loi University, promoting applied research programs in Information Technology and Water Resources fields.
2024.imgCaption: 65th anniversary of Thuy Loi University in 2024
